abstract.text: Tells the delegate that the user selected a shipping method, and asks for an updated payment request.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: The selected shipping method. This parameter contains one of the shipping methods specified in the payment request.
The completion handler to call with the updated payment summary items.
Use this method to update shipping costs based on the shipping address the user selected in a call to
. If the user didn’t select an address, use the prepopulated address of the payment request.
When the system calls this method, you create a new array of
objects that represent the updated cost including shipping. For more information on creating summary items, see the

abstract.text: Process Apple Pay payments in your app, and create and distribute passes for the Wallet app.
An object that presents a sheet that prompts the user to authorize a payment request.
Methods that let you respond to user interactions with your payment authorization view controller.
Tells the delegate that the user selected a shipping method, and asks for an updated payment request.
Tells the delegate that the user selected a shipping method, and asks for an updated payment request.
Tells the delegate that the user selected a shipping address, and asks for an updated payment request.
Tells the delegate that the user selected a shipping address, and asks for an updated payment request.
An object that represents a request for payment, including details about payment-processing capabilities, the payment amount, and shipping information.
An array of payment summary item objects that summarize the amount of the payment.
An object that updates the payment request after the shipping method changed.
An object that defines a summary item in a payment request, taxes, discounts, shipping, a grand total, and the like.
An object that defines a shipping method for delivering physical goods.
The return type of functions that don’t explicitly specify a return type, that is, an empty tuple `()`.

inlineContent.text: The selected shipping method. This parameter contains one of the shipping methods specified in the payment request.
The completion handler to call with the updated payment summary items.
